findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to change critical parameters such as tax, charity and burn fee, charity wallet, maximum transaction amount, and exclude from fees.
